DOC.brief_title: A Trial Negative Ion Generation Versus Light-Emitting Diode Phototherapy Seasonal Affective Disorder ( SAD )
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , control clinical trial comparing inactivate negative ion generation ( placebo condition ) light-emitting photodiode therapy ( active condition ) , Seasonal Affective Disorder ( SAD , winter depression ) , subject DSM IV diagnosis Major Depression , Seasonal Pattern , Winter type , examine efficacy treatment condition . Exclusion criterion include current treatment SAD , well bipolar disorder , type 1 , chronic psychotic disorder , substance use full remission least one year . The trial 1 week baseline phase subject see weekly 4 week treatment phase . The study double-blind . The study conduct 8 site US , Canada The Netherlands .
